Main pronunciation 主要发音: jiào

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to call.

English senses 英语理解: cry, shout; hail, greet, call

Usage example 用法举例: 叫喊 jiào hǎn (shout)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 328

Shuowen 说文解字: 呼也從口丩聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 呌 older 叫 from mouth 口 kǒu and (rem- 斗 dòu) from phonetic two-hooks 丩 jiū C268 叫<呌> simp 叫.

呌字的基本解释

呌
jiào
同“叫”。

呌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》古弔切，去嘯，見。］
亦作“呌1”。亦作“嘄2”。
(1)呼喊；喊叫。
(2)招唤；招呼。
(3)鸣叫。
(4)犹吹奏。
(5)诉说。参见“叫苦”。
(6)名称是；称为。
(7)雇；到店里订购东西让送来。
(8)使，令。
(9)当，当作。参见“叫真”。
(10)容许或听任。
(11)指某些家畜发情。
(12)方言。某些家畜或家禽中的雄性。参见“叫驢”、“叫鷄”。
(13)介词。让；被。
(14)见“叫窱”。

呌
Basic explanation of words
呌
jiào
Same as "called".
呌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" ancient hanging cut, go to Xiao, see. ]
Also known as "呌1". Also known as "嘄2".
(1) Shout; shout.
(2) Call; hello.
(3) Tweet.
(4) Still playing.
(5) Telling. See "cry".
(6) The name is; called.
(7) Hire; order things in the store for delivery.
(8) Make, make.
(9) When, as. See "Calling True".
(10) Allow or leave.
(11) Refers to certain domestic animals in estrus.
(12) Dialects. The male of certain livestock or poultry. See also "calling a donkey", "calling a chicken".
(13) Prepositions. Let; be.
(14) See "called 窱".
